NAME: Water
Description: A colorless, tasteless, and odorless liquid essential for most forms of life.

NAME: Sodium Chloride
Description: Commonly known as table salt, it is a white crystalline solid.

NAME: Carbon Dioxide
Description: A colorless gas with a faint sharp odor and a sour taste.

NAME: Ammonia
Description: A colorless gas with a characteristic pungent smell.

NAME: Calcium Carbonate
Description: A white insoluble solid occurring naturally as chalk, limestone, marble, and calcite.

NAME: Methane
Description: A colorless, odorless, flammable gas that is the simplest alkane.

NAME: Hydrochloric Acid
Description: A strong, corrosive acid that is commonly used as a laboratory reagent.

NAME: Sulfuric Acid
Description: A highly corrosive strong mineral acid.

NAME: Ethanol
Description: A volatile, flammable, colorless liquid with a slight characteristic odor.

NAME: Glucose
Description: A simple sugar that is an important energy source in living organisms.

NAME: Hydrogen Peroxide
Description: A pale blue liquid in its pure form, commonly used as a disinfectant and bleaching agent.

NAME: Nitric Acid
Description: A highly corrosive and toxic strong acid used in fertilizer and explosives production.

NAME: Calcium Hydroxide
Description: Also known as slaked lime, a white powder or crystal used in construction and agriculture.

NAME: Magnesium Oxide
Description: A white powder used as a refractory material and antacid.

NAME: Silicon Dioxide
Description: Also known as silica, a major component of sand, quartz, and glass.

NAME: Aluminum Oxide
Description: A white or nearly colorless crystalline substance used as an abrasive and in ceramics.

NAME: Phosphoric Acid
Description: A colorless, odorless acid used in fertilizers and food flavoring.

NAME: Potassium Nitrate
Description: A white crystalline salt used in fertilizers and explosives.

NAME: Calcium Phosphate
Description: A white powder used in animal feed, fertilizers, and toothpaste.

NAME: Acetic Acid
Description: An organic acid giving vinegar its sour taste and strong smell.

NAME: Baking Soda
Description: Also known as sodium bicarbonate, a white solid that is commonly used as a leavening agent.

NAME: Sodium Hydroxide
Description: Also known as lye or caustic soda, a highly caustic base used in many industries.

NAME: Calcium Chloride
Description: A white crystalline salt that is highly soluble in water, often used for de-icing.

NAME: Iron(III) Oxide
Description: Commonly known as rust, a reddish-brown solid formed when iron oxidizes.

NAME: Zinc Oxide
Description: A white powder used in rubber, cosmetics, and sunscreen.

NAME: Sodium Carbonate
Description: Also known as washing soda, used in manufacturing glass and in water softening.
